https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard/:Annotation LinkML Source Direct name: Annotation description: 'A collection of fields recording a cell type/class/state annotation on some set of cells, supporting evidence and provenance. As this is intended as a general schema, compulsory fields are kept to a minimum. However, tools using this schema are encouarged to specify a larger set of compulsory fields for publication. Note: This schema deliberately allows for additional fields in order to support ad hoc user fields, new formal schema extensions and project/tool specific metadata.' from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slots: - labelset - cell_label - cell_fullname - cell_ontology_term_id - cell_ontology_term - cell_ids - rationale - rationale_dois - marker_gene_evidence - synonyms - reviews - author_annotation_fields attributes: labelset: name: labelset description: "The unique name of the set of cell annotations. 
Each cell within\ \ the AnnData/Seurat file MUST be associated with a 'cell_label' value in order\ \ for this to be a valid 'cellannotation_setname'." from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: CAS:has_labelset alias: labelset owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string required: true cell_label: name: cell_label description: "This denotes any free-text term which the author uses to annotate\ \ cells, i.e. the preferred cell label name used by the author. Abbreviations\ \ are exceptable in this field; refer to 'cell_fullname' for related details.\ \ 
Certain key words have been reserved:
- `'doublets'` is reserved for encoding\ \ cells defined as doublets based on some computational analysis
- `'junk'`\ \ is reserved for encoding cells that failed sequencing for some reason, e.g.\ \ few genes detected, high fraction of mitochondrial reads
- `'unknown'` is\ \ explicitly reserved for unknown or 'author does not know'
- `'NA'` is incomplete,\ \ i.e. no cell annotation was provided" from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: rdfs:label alias: cell_label owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string required: true cell_fullname: name: cell_fullname description: "This MUST be the full-length name for the biological entity listed\ \ in `cell_label` by the author. (If the value in `cell_label` is the full-length\ \ term, this field will contain the same value.) 
NOTE: any reserved word used\ \ in the field 'cell_label' MUST match the value of this field. 

EXAMPLE\ \ 1: Given the matching terms 'LC' and 'luminal cell' used to annotate the same\ \ cell(s), then users could use either terms as values in the field 'cell_label'.\ \ However, the abbreviation 'LC' CANNOT be provided in the field 'cell_fullname'.\ \ 

EXAMPLE 2: Either the abbreviation 'AC' or the full-length term intended\ \ by the author 'GABAergic amacrine cell' MAY be placed in the field 'cell_label',\ \ but as full-length term naming this biological entity, 'GABAergic amacrine\ \ cell' MUST be placed in the field 'cell_fullname'." from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: skos:preflabel alias: cell_fullname owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string cell_ontology_term_id: name: cell_ontology_term_id description: 'This MUST be a term from either the Cell Ontology (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/cl) or from some ontology that extends it by classifying cell types under terms from the Cell Ontology e.g. the Provisional Cell Ontology (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/pcl) or the Drosophila Anatomy Ontology (DAO) (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols4/ontologies/fbbt). NOTE: The closest available ontology term matching the value within the field ''cell_label'' (at the time of publication) MUST be used. For example, if the value of ''cell_label'' is ''relay interneuron'', but this entity does not yet exist in the ontology, users must choose the closest available term in the CL ontology. In this case, it''s the broader term ''interneuron'' i.e. https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/cl/terms?obo_id=CL:0000099.' from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: RO:0002473 alias: cell_ontology_term_id owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: CellTypeEnum cell_ontology_term: name: cell_ontology_term description: This MUST be the human-readable name assigned to the value of 'cell_ontology_term_id' from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: cell_ontology_term owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string cell_ids: name: cell_ids description: Cell barcode sequences/UUIDs used to uniquely identify the cells within the AnnData/Seurat matrix. Any and all cell barcode sequences/UUIDs MUST be included in the AnnData/Seurat matrix. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: CAS:has_cellid alias: cell_ids owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true rationale: name: rationale description: "The free-text rationale which users provide as justification/evidence\ \ for their cell annotations. 
Researchers are encouraged to use this field\ \ to cite relevant publications in-line using standard academic citations of\ \ the form `(Zheng et al., 2020)` This human-readable free-text MUST be encoded\ \ as a single string.
All references cited SHOULD be listed using DOIs under\ \ rationale_dois. There MUST be a 2000-character limit." from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: rationale owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string rationale_dois: name: rationale_dois from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: rationale_dois owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true marker_gene_evidence: name: marker_gene_evidence description: Gene names explicitly used as evidence, which MUST be in the matrix of the AnnData/Seurat file from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: marker_gene_evidence owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true synonyms: name: synonyms description: List of synonyms from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: synonyms owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true reviews: name: reviews from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: reviews owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: Review multivalued: true author_annotation_fields: name: author_annotation_fields description: A dictionary of author defined key value pairs annotating the cell set. The names and aims of these fields MUST not clash with official annotation fields. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: author_annotation_fields owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string Induced name: Annotation description: 'A collection of fields recording a cell type/class/state annotation on some set of cells, supporting evidence and provenance. Note: This schema deliberately allows for additional fields in order to support ad hoc user fields, new formal schema extensions and project/tool specific metadata.' from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard attributes: labelset: name: labelset description: "The unique name of the set of cell annotations.

- `'NA'` is incomplete,\ \ i.e. no cell annotation was provided" from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: rdfs:label alias: cell_label owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string required: true cell_fullname: name: cell_fullname description: "This MUST be the full-length name for the biological entity listed\ \ in `cell_label` by the author. NOTE: The closest available ontology term matching the value within the field ''cell_label'' (at the time of publication) MUST be used. For example, if the value of ''cell_label'' is ''relay interneuron'', but this entity does not yet exist in the ontology, users must choose the closest available term in the CL ontology. In this case, it''s the broader term ''interneuron'' i.e. https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/cl/terms?obo_id=CL:0000099.' from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: RO:0002473 alias: cell_ontology_term_id owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: CellTypeEnum cell_ontology_term: name: cell_ontology_term description: This MUST be the human-readable name assigned to the value of 'cell_ontology_term_id' from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: cell_ontology_term owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string cell_ids: name: cell_ids description: Cell barcode sequences/UUIDs used to uniquely identify the cells within the AnnData/Seurat matrix. Any and all cell barcode sequences/UUIDs MUST be included in the AnnData/Seurat matrix. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: CAS:has_cellid alias: cell_ids owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true rationale: name: rationale description: "The free-text rationale which users provide as justification/evidence\ \ for their cell annotations. 
Researchers are encouraged to use this field\ \ to cite relevant publications in-line using standard academic citations of\ \ the form `(Zheng et al., 2020)` This human-readable free-text MUST be encoded\ \ as a single string.
All references cited SHOULD be listed using DOIs under\ \ rationale_dois. There MUST be a 2000-character limit." from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: rationale owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string rationale_dois: name: rationale_dois from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: rationale_dois owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true marker_gene_evidence: name: marker_gene_evidence description: Gene names explicitly used as evidence, which MUST be in the matrix of the AnnData/Seurat file from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: marker_gene_evidence owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true synonyms: name: synonyms description: List of synonyms from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: synonyms owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true reviews: name: reviews from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: reviews owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: Review multivalued: true author_annotation_fields: name: author_annotation_fields description: A dictionary of author defined key value pairs annotating the cell set. The names and aims of these fields MUST not clash with official annotation fields. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: author_annotation_fields owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string

docs.text:
name: Annotation description: 'A collection of fields recording a cell type/class/state annotation on some set of cells, supporting evidence and provenance. As this is intended as a general schema, compulsory fields are kept to a minimum. However, tools using this schema are encouarged to specify a larger set of compulsory fields for publication. Note: This schema deliberately allows for additional fields in order to support ad hoc user fields, new formal schema extensions and project/tool specific metadata.' from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard attributes: labelset: name: labelset description: "The unique name of the set of cell annotations. 
Each cell within\ \ the AnnData/Seurat file MUST be associated with a 'cell_label' value in order\ \ for this to be a valid 'cellannotation_setname'." from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: CAS:has_labelset alias: labelset owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string required: true cell_label: name: cell_label description: "This denotes any free-text term which the author uses to annotate\ \ cells, i.e. the preferred cell label name used by the author. Abbreviations\ \ are exceptable in this field; refer to 'cell_fullname' for related details.\ \ 
Certain key words have been reserved:
- `'doublets'` is reserved for encoding\ \ cells defined as doublets based on some computational analysis
- `'junk'`\ \ is reserved for encoding cells that failed sequencing for some reason, e.g.\ \ few genes detected, high fraction of mitochondrial reads
- `'unknown'` is\ \ explicitly reserved for unknown or 'author does not know'
- `'NA'` is incomplete,\ \ i.e. no cell annotation was provided" from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: rdfs:label alias: cell_label owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string required: true cell_fullname: name: cell_fullname description: "This MUST be the full-length name for the biological entity listed\ \ in `cell_label` by the author. (If the value in `cell_label` is the full-length\ \ term, this field will contain the same value.) 
NOTE: any reserved word used\ \ in the field 'cell_label' MUST match the value of this field. 

EXAMPLE\ \ 1: Given the matching terms 'LC' and 'luminal cell' used to annotate the same\ \ cell(s), then users could use either terms as values in the field 'cell_label'.\ \ However, the abbreviation 'LC' CANNOT be provided in the field 'cell_fullname'.\ \ 

EXAMPLE 2: Either the abbreviation 'AC' or the full-length term intended\ \ by the author 'GABAergic amacrine cell' MAY be placed in the field 'cell_label',\ \ but as full-length term naming this biological entity, 'GABAergic amacrine\ \ cell' MUST be placed in the field 'cell_fullname'." from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: skos:preflabel alias: cell_fullname owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string cell_ontology_term_id: name: cell_ontology_term_id description: 'This MUST be a term from either the Cell Ontology (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/cl) or from some ontology that extends it by classifying cell types under terms from the Cell Ontology e.g. the Provisional Cell Ontology (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/pcl) or the Drosophila Anatomy Ontology (DAO) (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols4/ontologies/fbbt). NOTE: The closest available ontology term matching the value within the field ''cell_label'' (at the time of publication) MUST be used. For example, if the value of ''cell_label'' is ''relay interneuron'', but this entity does not yet exist in the ontology, users must choose the closest available term in the CL ontology. In this case, it''s the broader term ''interneuron'' i.e. https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/cl/terms?obo_id=CL:0000099.' from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: RO:0002473 alias: cell_ontology_term_id owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: CellTypeEnum cell_ontology_term: name: cell_ontology_term description: This MUST be the human-readable name assigned to the value of 'cell_ontology_term_id' from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: cell_ontology_term owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string cell_ids: name: cell_ids description: Cell barcode sequences/UUIDs used to uniquely identify the cells within the AnnData/Seurat matrix. Any and all cell barcode sequences/UUIDs MUST be included in the AnnData/Seurat matrix. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: CAS:has_cellid alias: cell_ids owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true rationale: name: rationale description: "The free-text rationale which users provide as justification/evidence\ \ for their cell annotations. 
Researchers are encouraged to use this field\ \ to cite relevant publications in-line using standard academic citations of\ \ the form `(Zheng et al., 2020)` This human-readable free-text MUST be encoded\ \ as a single string.
All references cited SHOULD be listed using DOIs under\ \ rationale_dois. There MUST be a 2000-character limit." from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: rationale owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string rationale_dois: name: rationale_dois from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: rationale_dois owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true marker_gene_evidence: name: marker_gene_evidence description: Gene names explicitly used as evidence, which MUST be in the matrix of the AnnData/Seurat file from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: marker_gene_evidence owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true synonyms: name: synonyms description: List of synonyms from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: synonyms owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true reviews: name: reviews from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: reviews owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: Review multivalued: true author_annotation_fields: name: author_annotation_fields description: A dictionary of author defined key value pairs annotating the cell set. The names and aims of these fields MUST not clash with official annotation fields. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: author_annotation_fields owner: Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string

Cap_Annotation range: string category_cell_ontology_term: name: category_cell_ontology_term description: The human-readable name assigned to the value of 'category_cell_ontology_term_id'. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: category_cell_ontology_term owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Cap_Annotation range: string cell_ontology_assessment: name: cell_ontology_assessment description: Free-text field for researchers to express disagreements with any aspect of the Cell Ontology for this cell annotation. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: cell_ontology_assessment owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Cap_Annotation range: string labelset: name: labelset description: "The unique name of the set of cell annotations. 
Each cell within\ \ the AnnData/Seurat file MUST be associated with a 'cell_label' value in order\ \ for this to be a valid 'cellannotation_setname'." from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: CAS:has_labelset alias: labelset owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string required: true cell_label: name: cell_label description: "This denotes any free-text term which the author uses to annotate\ \ cells, i.e. the preferred cell label name used by the author. Abbreviations\ \ are exceptable in this field; refer to 'cell_fullname' for related details.\ \ 
Certain key words have been reserved:
- `'doublets'` is reserved for encoding\ \ cells defined as doublets based on some computational analysis
- `'junk'`\ \ is reserved for encoding cells that failed sequencing for some reason, e.g.\ \ few genes detected, high fraction of mitochondrial reads
- `'unknown'` is\ \ explicitly reserved for unknown or 'author does not know'
- `'NA'` is incomplete,\ \ i.e. no cell annotation was provided" from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: rdfs:label alias: cell_label owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string required: true cell_fullname: name: cell_fullname description: "This MUST be the full-length name for the biological entity listed\ \ in `cell_label` by the author. (If the value in `cell_label` is the full-length\ \ term, this field will contain the same value.) 
NOTE: any reserved word used\ \ in the field 'cell_label' MUST match the value of this field. 

EXAMPLE\ \ 1: Given the matching terms 'LC' and 'luminal cell' used to annotate the same\ \ cell(s), then users could use either terms as values in the field 'cell_label'.\ \ However, the abbreviation 'LC' CANNOT be provided in the field 'cell_fullname'.\ \ 

EXAMPLE 2: Either the abbreviation 'AC' or the full-length term intended\ \ by the author 'GABAergic amacrine cell' MAY be placed in the field 'cell_label',\ \ but as full-length term naming this biological entity, 'GABAergic amacrine\ \ cell' MUST be placed in the field 'cell_fullname'." from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: skos:preflabel alias: cell_fullname owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string cell_ontology_term_id: name: cell_ontology_term_id description: 'This MUST be a term from either the Cell Ontology (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/cl) or from some ontology that extends it by classifying cell types under terms from the Cell Ontology e.g. the Provisional Cell Ontology (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/pcl) or the Drosophila Anatomy Ontology (DAO) (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols4/ontologies/fbbt). NOTE: The closest available ontology term matching the value within the field ''cell_label'' (at the time of publication) MUST be used. For example, if the value of ''cell_label'' is ''relay interneuron'', but this entity does not yet exist in the ontology, users must choose the closest available term in the CL ontology. In this case, it''s the broader term ''interneuron'' i.e. https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/cl/terms?obo_id=CL:0000099.' from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: RO:0002473 alias: cell_ontology_term_id owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: CellTypeEnum cell_ontology_term: name: cell_ontology_term description: This MUST be the human-readable name assigned to the value of 'cell_ontology_term_id' from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: cell_ontology_term owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string cell_ids: name: cell_ids description: Cell barcode sequences/UUIDs used to uniquely identify the cells within the AnnData/Seurat matrix. Any and all cell barcode sequences/UUIDs MUST be included in the AnnData/Seurat matrix. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: CAS:has_cellid alias: cell_ids owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true rationale: name: rationale description: "The free-text rationale which users provide as justification/evidence\ \ for their cell annotations. 
Researchers are encouraged to use this field\ \ to cite relevant publications in-line using standard academic citations of\ \ the form `(Zheng et al., 2020)` This human-readable free-text MUST be encoded\ \ as a single string.
All references cited SHOULD be listed using DOIs under\ \ rationale_dois. There MUST be a 2000-character limit." from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: rationale owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string rationale_dois: name: rationale_dois from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: rationale_dois owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true marker_gene_evidence: name: marker_gene_evidence description: Gene names explicitly used as evidence, which MUST be in the matrix of the AnnData/Seurat file from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: marker_gene_evidence owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true synonyms: name: synonyms description: List of synonyms from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: synonyms owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true reviews: name: reviews from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: reviews owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: Review multivalued: true author_annotation_fields: name: author_annotation_fields description: A dictionary of author defined key value pairs annotating the cell set. The names and aims of these fields MUST not clash with official annotation fields. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: author_annotation_fields owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - There MUST be a 2000-character limit." from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: rationale owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string rationale_dois: name: rationale_dois from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: rationale_dois owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true marker_gene_evidence: name: marker_gene_evidence description: Gene names explicitly used as evidence, which MUST be in the matrix of the AnnData/Seurat file from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: marker_gene_evidence owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true synonyms: name: synonyms description: List of synonyms from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: synonyms owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true reviews: name: reviews from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: reviews owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: Review multivalued: true author_annotation_fields: name: author_annotation_fields description: A dictionary of author defined key value pairs annotating the cell set. The names and aims of these fields MUST not clash with official annotation fields. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: author_annotation_fields owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string

docs.text:
name: Cap_Annotation from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard is_a: Annotation attributes: canonical_marker_genes: name: canonical_marker_genes description: A list of gene names considered to be canonical markers for the biological entity used in the cell annotation. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: canonical_marker_genes owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true cell_ontology_exists: name: cell_ontology_exists description: Decision by user whether this biological entity exists in the current Cell Ontology or not (at the given time of publication). from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: cell_ontology_exists owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Cap_Annotation range: boolean category_fullname: name: category_fullname description: Any term denoting a biological entity which the author associates as the nearest "class" or "broader term" (or "parent term") for the value/term in the field. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: category_fullname owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Cap_Annotation range: string category_cell_ontology_exists: name: category_cell_ontology_exists description: Decision by user whether this biological entity exists in the current Cell Ontology or not (at the given time of publication). from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: category_cell_ontology_exists owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Cap_Annotation range: boolean category_cell_ontology_term_id: name: category_cell_ontology_term_id description: The ID from either the Cell Ontology or from some ontology that extends it by classifying cell types under terms from the Cell Ontology. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: category_cell_ontology_term_id owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Cap_Annotation range: string category_cell_ontology_term: name: category_cell_ontology_term description: The human-readable name assigned to the value of 'category_cell_ontology_term_id'. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: category_cell_ontology_term owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Cap_Annotation range: string cell_ontology_assessment: name: cell_ontology_assessment description: Free-text field for researchers to express disagreements with any aspect of the Cell Ontology for this cell annotation. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: cell_ontology_assessment owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Cap_Annotation range: string labelset: name: labelset description: "The unique name of the set of cell annotations. 
Each cell within\ \ the AnnData/Seurat file MUST be associated with a 'cell_label' value in order\ \ for this to be a valid 'cellannotation_setname'." from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: CAS:has_labelset alias: labelset owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string required: true cell_label: name: cell_label description: "This denotes any free-text term which the author uses to annotate\ \ cells, i.e. the preferred cell label name used by the author. Abbreviations\ \ are exceptable in this field; refer to 'cell_fullname' for related details.\ \ 
Certain key words have been reserved:
- `'doublets'` is reserved for encoding\ \ cells defined as doublets based on some computational analysis
- `'junk'`\ \ is reserved for encoding cells that failed sequencing for some reason, e.g.\ \ few genes detected, high fraction of mitochondrial reads
- `'unknown'` is\ \ explicitly reserved for unknown or 'author does not know'
- `'NA'` is incomplete,\ \ i.e. no cell annotation was provided" from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: rdfs:label alias: cell_label owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string required: true cell_fullname: name: cell_fullname description: "This MUST be the full-length name for the biological entity listed\ \ in `cell_label` by the author. (If the value in `cell_label` is the full-length\ \ term, this field will contain the same value.) 
NOTE: any reserved word used\ \ in the field 'cell_label' MUST match the value of this field. 

EXAMPLE\ \ 1: Given the matching terms 'LC' and 'luminal cell' used to annotate the same\ \ cell(s), then users could use either terms as values in the field 'cell_label'.\ \ However, the abbreviation 'LC' CANNOT be provided in the field 'cell_fullname'.\ \ 

EXAMPLE 2: Either the abbreviation 'AC' or the full-length term intended\ \ by the author 'GABAergic amacrine cell' MAY be placed in the field 'cell_label',\ \ but as full-length term naming this biological entity, 'GABAergic amacrine\ \ cell' MUST be placed in the field 'cell_fullname'." from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: skos:preflabel alias: cell_fullname owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string cell_ontology_term_id: name: cell_ontology_term_id description: 'This MUST be a term from either the Cell Ontology (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/cl) or from some ontology that extends it by classifying cell types under terms from the Cell Ontology e.g. the Provisional Cell Ontology (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/pcl) or the Drosophila Anatomy Ontology (DAO) (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols4/ontologies/fbbt). NOTE: The closest available ontology term matching the value within the field ''cell_label'' (at the time of publication) MUST be used. For example, if the value of ''cell_label'' is ''relay interneuron'', but this entity does not yet exist in the ontology, users must choose the closest available term in the CL ontology. In this case, it''s the broader term ''interneuron'' i.e. https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/cl/terms?obo_id=CL:0000099.' from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: RO:0002473 alias: cell_ontology_term_id owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: CellTypeEnum cell_ontology_term: name: cell_ontology_term description: This MUST be the human-readable name assigned to the value of 'cell_ontology_term_id' from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: cell_ontology_term owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string cell_ids: name: cell_ids description: Cell barcode sequences/UUIDs used to uniquely identify the cells within the AnnData/Seurat matrix. Any and all cell barcode sequences/UUIDs MUST be included in the AnnData/Seurat matrix. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: CAS:has_cellid alias: cell_ids owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true rationale: name: rationale description: "The free-text rationale which users provide as justification/evidence\ \ for their cell annotations. 
Researchers are encouraged to use this field\ \ to cite relevant publications in-line using standard academic citations of\ \ the form `(Zheng et al., 2020)` This human-readable free-text MUST be encoded\ \ as a single string.
All references cited SHOULD be listed using DOIs under\ \ rationale_dois. There MUST be a 2000-character limit." from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: rationale owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string rationale_dois: name: rationale_dois from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: rationale_dois owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true marker_gene_evidence: name: marker_gene_evidence description: Gene names explicitly used as evidence, which MUST be in the matrix of the AnnData/Seurat file from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: marker_gene_evidence owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true synonyms: name: synonyms description: List of synonyms from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: synonyms owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string multivalued: true reviews: name: reviews from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: reviews owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: Review multivalued: true author_annotation_fields: name: author_annotation_fields description: A dictionary of author defined key value pairs annotating the cell set. The names and aims of these fields MUST not clash with official annotation fields. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: author_annotation_fields owner: Cap_Annotation domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string

docs.text: name: Cap_Taxonomy from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard is_a: Taxonomy slots: - cap_publication_title - cap_publication_description - cap_publication_url - cap_dataset_url - publication_timestamp - publication_version slot_usage: annotations: name: annotations domain_of: - Taxonomy - Cap_Taxonomy range: Cap_Annotation cellannotation_schema_version: name: cellannotation_schema_version domain_of: - Taxonomy - Cap_Taxonomy required: true cellannotation_timestamp: name: cellannotation_timestamp domain_of: - Taxonomy - Cap_Taxonomy required: true cellannotation_version: name: cellannotation_version domain_of: - Taxonomy - Cap_Taxonomy required: true cellannotation_url: name: cellannotation_url domain_of: - Taxonomy - Cap_Taxonomy required: true attributes: cap_publication_title: name: cap_publication_title description: 'The title of the publication on CAP (i.e. a published collection of datasets, the \"CAP Workspace\".). The title of the publication on CAP. (NOTE: the term \"publication\" refers to the workspace published on CAP with a version and timestamp.) This MUST be less than or equal to N characters, and this MUST be encoded as a single string.' from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: cap_publication_title owner: Cap_Taxonomy domain_of: - Cap_Taxonomy range: string cap_publication_description: name: cap_publication_description description: 'The description of the publication on CAP. The description of the publication on CAP. (NOTE: the term \"publication\" refers to the workspace published on CAP with a version and timestamp.) This MUST be less than or equal to N characters, and this MUST be encoded as a single string.' from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: cap_publication_description owner: Cap_Taxonomy domain_of: - Cap_Taxonomy range: string cap_publication_url: name: cap_publication_url description: 'A persistent URL of the publication on CAP. (NOTE: the term \"publication\" refers to the workspace published on CAP with a version and timestamp.)' from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: cap_publication_url owner: Cap_Taxonomy domain_of: - Cap_Taxonomy range: string cap_dataset_url: name: cap_dataset_url description: A persistent URL of the dataset on CAP. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: cap_dataset_url owner: Cap_Taxonomy domain_of: - Cap_Taxonomy range: string publication_timestamp: name: publication_timestamp description: The timestamp of the CAP publication. This MUST be a string in the format %yyyy-%MM-%dd'T'%hh:%mm:%ss. This value will be overwritten by the newest timestamp upon a new publication. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: publication_timestamp owner: Cap_Taxonomy domain_of: - Cap_Taxonomy range: string publication_version: name: publication_version description: The (latest) version of the CAP publication. This value will be overwritten by the newest version upon a new publication (and automatically incremented). This versioning MUST follow the format 'v' + '[integer]', whereby newer versions must be naturally incremented. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: publication_version owner: Cap_Taxonomy domain_of: - Cap_Taxonomy range: string matrix_file_id: name: matrix_file_id description: A resolvable ID for a cell by gene matrix file in the form namespace:accession, e.g. CellXGene_dataset:8e10f1c4-8e98-41e5-b65f-8cd89a887122. Please see https://github.com/cellannotation/cell-annotation-schema/registry/registry.json for supported namespaces. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: matrix_file_id owner: Cap_Taxonomy domain_of: - Taxonomy - Cap_Taxonomy range: string title: name: title description: The title of the dataset. This MUST be less than or equal to 200 characters. e.g. 'Human retina cell atlas - retinal ganglion cells'. from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard alias: title owner: Cap_Taxonomy domain_of: - Taxonomy - Cap_Taxonomy range: string required: true description: name: description description: The description of the dataset. e.g. 'A total of 15 retinal ganglion cell clusters were identified from over 99K retinal ganglion cell nuclei in the current atlas. Utilizing previous characterized markers from macaque, 5 clusters can be annotated.' from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard slot_uri: IAO:0000115 alias: description owner: Cap_Taxonomy domain_of: - Labelset - Taxonomy - Cap_Taxonomy range: string cellannotation_schema_version: name: cellannotation_schema_version description: 'The schema version, the cell annotation open standard. docs.text:
Slot: cell_fullname _This MUST be the full-length name for the biological entity listed in cell_label by the author. (If the value in cell_label is the full-length term, this field will contain the same value.) _ _NOTE: any reserved word used in the field 'cell_label' MUST match the value of this field. _ __ _EXAMPLE 1: Given the matching terms 'LC' and 'luminal cell' used to annotate the same cell(s), then users could use either terms as values in the field 'cell_label'. However, the abbreviation 'LC' CANNOT be provided in the field 'cell_fullname'. _ __ EXAMPLE 2: Either the abbreviation 'AC' or the full-length term intended by the author 'GABAergic amacrine cell' MAY be placed in the field 'cell_label', but as full-length term naming this biological entity, 'GABAergic amacrine cell' MUST be placed in the field 'cell_fullname'. URI: skos:preflabel Applicable Classes Name Description Modifies Slot Annotation A collection of fields recording a cell type/class/state annotation on some s... no CapAnnotation no Properties Range: String Identifier and Mapping Information Schema Source from schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard Mappings Mapping Type Mapped Value self skos:preflabel native https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard/:cell_fullname LinkML Source name: cell_fullname description: "This MUST be the full-length name for the biological entity listed in\ \ `cell_label` by the author. (If the value in `cell_label` is the full-length term,\ \ this field will contain the same value.) 
NOTE: any reserved word used in the\ \ field 'cell_label' MUST match the value of this field. 

EXAMPLE 1: Given the\ \ matching terms 'LC' and 'luminal cell' used to annotate the same cell(s), then\ \ users could use either terms as values in the field 'cell_label'. However, the\ \ abbreviation 'LC' CANNOT be provided in the field 'cell_fullname'. 

EXAMPLE\ \ 2: Either the abbreviation 'AC' or the full-length term intended by the author\ \ 'GABAergic amacrine cell' MAY be placed in the field 'cell_label', but as full-length\ \ term naming this biological entity, 'GABAergic amacrine cell' MUST be placed in\ \ the field 'cell_fullname'." from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard rank: 1000 slot_uri: skos:preflabel alias: cell_fullname domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string

docs.text:
Slot: cell_label _This denotes any free-text term which the author uses to annotate cells, i.e. the preferred cell label name used by the author. Abbreviations are exceptable in this field; refer to 'cell_fullname' for related details. _ Certain key words have been reserved: - 'doublets' is reserved for encoding cells defined as doublets based on some computational analysis - 'junk' is reserved for encoding cells that failed sequencing for some reason, e.g. few genes detected, high fraction of mitochondrial reads - 'unknown' is explicitly reserved for unknown or 'author does not know' - 'NA' is incomplete, i.e. no cell annotation was provided URI: rdfs:label Applicable Classes Name Description Modifies Slot Annotation A collection of fields recording a cell type/class/state annotation on some s... no CapAnnotation no Properties Range: String Required: True Identifier and Mapping Information Schema Source from schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard Mappings Mapping Type Mapped Value self rdfs:label native https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard/:cell_label LinkML Source name: cell_label description: "This denotes any free-text term which the author uses to annotate cells,\ \ i.e. the preferred cell label name used by the author. Abbreviations are exceptable\ \ in this field; refer to 'cell_fullname' for related details. 
Certain key words\ \ have been reserved:
- `'doublets'` is reserved for encoding cells defined as\ \ doublets based on some computational analysis
- `'junk'` is reserved for encoding\ \ cells that failed sequencing for some reason, e.g. few genes detected, high fraction\ \ of mitochondrial reads
- `'unknown'` is explicitly reserved for unknown or 'author\ \ does not know'
- `'NA'` is incomplete, i.e. no cell annotation was provided" from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard rank: 1000 slot_uri: rdfs:label alias: cell_label domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: string required: true

docs.text: Slot: cell_ontology_term_id This MUST be a term from either the Cell Ontology (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/cl) or from some ontology that extends it by classifying cell types under terms from the Cell Ontology e.g. the Provisional Cell Ontology (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/pcl) or the Drosophila Anatomy Ontology (DAO) (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols4/ontologies/fbbt). __ NOTE: The closest available ontology term matching the value within the field 'cell_label' (at the time of publication) MUST be used. For example, if the value of 'cell_label' is 'relay interneuron', but this entity does not yet exist in the ontology, users must choose the closest available term in the CL ontology. In this case, it's the broader term 'interneuron' i.e. https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/cl/terms?obo_id=CL:0000099. URI: RO:0002473 Applicable Classes Name Description Modifies Slot Annotation A collection of fields recording a cell type/class/state annotation on some s... no CapAnnotation no Properties Range: CellTypeEnum Identifier and Mapping Information Schema Source from schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard Mappings Mapping Type Mapped Value self RO:0002473 native https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard/:cell_ontology_term_id LinkML Source name: cell_ontology_term_id description: 'This MUST be a term from either the Cell Ontology (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/cl) or from some ontology that extends it by classifying cell types under terms from the Cell Ontology e.g. the Provisional Cell Ontology (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/pcl) or the Drosophila Anatomy Ontology (DAO) (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols4/ontologies/fbbt). NOTE: The closest available ontology term matching the value within the field ''cell_label'' (at the time of publication) MUST be used. For example, if the value of ''cell_label'' is ''relay interneuron'', but this entity does not yet exist in the ontology, users must choose the closest available term in the CL ontology. In this case, it''s the broader term ''interneuron'' i.e. https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/cl/terms?obo_id=CL:0000099.' from_schema: https://w3id.org/Cellular-Semantics/General-Cell-Annotation-Open-Standard rank: 1000 slot_uri: RO:0002473 alias: cell_ontology_term_id domain_of: - Annotation - Cap_Annotation range: CellTypeEnum

docs.text: Slot: rationale _The free-text rationale which users provide as justification/evidence for their cell annotations. _ Researchers are encouraged to use this field to cite relevant publications in-line using standard academic citations of the form (Zheng et al., 2020) This human-readable free-text MUST be encoded as a single string. All references cited SHOULD be listed using DOIs under rationale_dois. There MUST be a 2000-character limit. docs.text: Slot: reference_location _This field denotes a valid URL of the annotated dataset that was the source of annotated reference data. _ This MUST be a string of a valid URL.
